description:
Formal model for the schema.json file (extraction pipeline output).

Used to generate the JSON Schema meta-schema and to validate the output.

schema_version.description: Semantic version of this schema format (contract version).
schema_version.title: Schema Version

generator_version.description: Version of the tool that generated this file (e.g. package version or git SHA).
generator_version.title: Generator Version

schema.description: Universal Carrier Format schema (name, base_url, endpoints, etc.).
schema.title: Schema

field_mappings.description: Field name mappings from carrier to universal.
field_mappings.title: Field Mappings

title: SchemaContractOutput
